message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $150. I think it's a great value, and I'm confident you'll love it.
I appreciate the enthusiasm, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $120 for the product.
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $130. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $115 for the product.

I understand you're still looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $125. It's the lowest price I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great deal.
